original_text: Then he heard a large crowd of people as they went along the road. So he asked the people near him what was happening.
korean_text: 무리가 지나감을 듣고 이 무슨 일이냐고 물은대

sentences.original_text: Then he heard a large crowd of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 많은 사람들의 무리를 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: as they went along the road
So he asked the people near him
